comment: The Organisation of Islamic Cooperation which has the largest voting block in the UN (which also has the support of Socialist nations) has set up a parallel Human Rights Charter to replace the Universal Declaration of Human Rights with their own Islamic Cairo Declaration which is in accordance with Islamic Sharia Law. Ready for a UNexit yet?

      :snt1 (s / set-up-03

                                    :ARG5 (o2 / organization
                                          :name (n2 / name
                                                :op1 "UN")))))
                  :ARG0-of (s2 / support-01
                        :ARG1 (n3 / nation
                              :mod (p / political-movement
                                    :name (n4 / name
                                          :op1 "socialism")))
                        :mod (a / also)))
            :ARG1 (c / Charter
                  :topic (r / right-05
                        :ARG1 (h3 / human))
                  :ARG1-of (p2 / parallel-01))
            :purpose (r2 / replace-01
                  :ARG0 o
                  :ARG1 (p3 / publication
                        :name (n5 / name
                              :op1 "Universal"

                              :op3 "of"
                              :op4 "Human"
                              :op5 "Rights"))
                  :ARG2 (p4 / publication
                        :name (n6 / name
                              :op1 "Islamic"
                              :op2 "Cairo"
                              :op3 "Declaration")
                        :poss o
                        :ARG1-of (a2 / accord-02

                                    :name (n7 / name
                                          :op1 "Sharia")
                                    :mod (r3 / religious-group
                                          :name (n8 / name
                                                :op1 "Islam")))))))
      :snt2 (r4 / ready-02
